story.title: The Clowns - Official - Part 2
story.storyDescription: They're on a mission. And they have no mercy.
story.prePaywallNotification: Ariel’s boyfriend is angry and conspiring with the enemy. See how in THE CLOWNS.
story.postPaywallNotification: Can Ariel trust Drew? Continue reading THE CLOWNS.

messages.text: You’re saying the clown that was chasing you just now…
Even under the makeup, I could see his birthmark.
This explains why he was acting so weird.
Earlier today, he was being all emo.
He was really out of it.
Every time I tried to take a selfie, he pushed my hand down.
I mean, can you blame him?
You take like a million selfies a day.
He was really angry about something.
We got in a fight. That’s why I went on the Ferris wheel alone.
And now he’s wreaking havoc at the carnival…
with a bunch of demented clowns?
I’m going to get some answers.
Lauren saw you with the clowns!
Good. Just stay out of it.
Drew, why are you doing this?
You don’t know what it’s like.
And you’re pretty, and everyone likes you.
I know your friends think you’re crazy for dating me.
I’m just that weird gamer kid.
Never invited to a party unless I’m with you.
Which is something you’ll never understand.
I hate when you talk like this.
You think being quiet is a bad thing?
It’s part of why I like you.
I remember when we first met in chemistry class.
For that dumb assignment on electron orbitals.
You were the first guy who didn’t just talk over me.
Well, you were the only person who would talk to me.
People see this birthmark on my cheek…
and they think I’m demented or something.
Everyone has something wrong with them, Drew.
We wanted to expose people for who they really are.
It wasn’t supposed to go this far.
I can’t believe you would do something so horrible.
Post photos of their true ugly selves…
And show them that they’re no better than someone like me…
But things have gotten way out of hand.
What did you think would happen?!
Just stay on the Ferris wheel, okay?
Not if I stop it before it gets worse.
Drew, I can see clowns all over this carnival.
How can you possibly stop it?
And I’m supposed to believe that?
Because I’m the only one who can save you…
Lauren is safe now. No thanks to you!
I helped Lauren find a place to hide.
No place on the ground is safe.
You have to help me find her.
And what if I don’t help you?
Then someone else will find her.
Okay. I’ll tell you where she is.
Yeah. These animals smell gross, but I’m safe.
Drew is walking this way! I think he saw me.
I told him where to find you.
Trust me. We have a plan.
There are clowns gathering under the Ferris wheel.
They’re pointing at the people stuck on the cars.
They’re climbing up the Ferris wheel!
They’re harassing this guy and his girlfriend two cars down from me…
The clowns just sprayed their faces with the gas!
The clowns just took a selfie with them.
I need to get off this ride.
You won’t survive a fall like that!
I have no choice. I’m climbing down.
You’d rather risk dying than mess up your pretty face?
The clowns are taking their mayhem to the next phase.
Some of them just spotted Drew and me in the zoo!
We’re running, but I can see them. They’re spraying the animals.
Demented animals are loose in the carnival…
I made it to a lower car on the other side.
The clowns are pulling people off other rides now.
They set fire to the rollercoaster cars.
I think they just reached the gas tank—it’s exploding like fireworks.
The rollercoaster just went up in flames!
People with disfigured faces running for their lives…
They’re bringing torches to the Ferris wheel!
And the giant wheel is rolling down the fairground.
I hope you’re seeing this Drew.
We’re the only ones who can stop it.
We need to lure all the clowns to one location.
Yes! I think I see something…
There’s a net below the waterfall…to catch anyone that slips.
It looks like the net is held up by poles on either side of the waterfall.
If we could get the clowns into the lake under the waterfall, maybe…
We could cut the ropes and trap them beneath the net!
At least until the police come.
But how can we get the clowns all in one place?
We need bait. Something they really want.
But you’re not going to like it.
